# The furnace is now operational and is actively working to smelt the iron ore. 
# It has consumed some coal as fuel and is processing the iron ore.
# 
# I will wait for the smelting process to complete and check how many iron plates are produced. 

# I will implement a wait loop for a maximum of 30 seconds to monitor the output of the furnace.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 10:  # Checking if 10 iron plates are produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will check the inventory of the furnace to see the number of iron plates produced.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Displaying the furnace inventory.
